text: Allahale kaphiraharuko nimti ‘‘nuhaki’’ patni ra ‘‘lutaki’’ patniko udaharana varnana gareko cha. Duvai hamra asala bhaktaharumadhye du'ivata bhaktaharuko gharama thi'in, ra duvaile uniprati visvasaghata garin, taba ti asala bhaktaharule uniharula'i allahako sajayabata baca'una sakenan, ra bhaniyo ki (he striharu) pravesa garnevalako sathama timi duvai pani narkama pravista bha'ihala
